mapper.select: select i.inspection_id as inspection_id, i.inspection_result as inspection_result, i.inspection_date as inspection_date, i.inspection_lab as inspection_lab, i.inspection_state as inspection_state, u1.user_name as inspection_doctor_name, u2.user_name as inspection_inspector_name, l.inspection_list_category as inspection_list_category, l.inspection_list_specimen as inspection_list_specimen, l.inspection_list_name as inspection_list_name, l.inspection_list_reference as inspection_list_reference, l.inspection_list_container as inspeciton_list_container, p.patient_name from inspections i, inspection_lists l, users u1, users u2, patients p where inspection_treatment_id = #{treatmentId} and inspection_inspection_list_id = inspection_list_id and inspection_doctor_id = u1.user_id and inspection_inspector_id = u2.user_id and inspection_patient_id = patient_id order by inspection_id desc
